title: SCUM
notes: Performance is really bad. 2560x1440, lowest settings 5-20 fps, high settings 15-30 FPS (yeah its weird), epic settings 5-20 FPS, no workarounds needed

title: SCUM
notes: Single Player: Sort of playable. Has a lot of 1 second long freezes. Multiplayer: Did not test long, but what i tested had really low FPS(unplayable).

title: SCUM

title: SCUM
notes: Performance is strange, higher settings can get better framerate. Setting everything to low gave decent performance. No bugs otherwise though

title: Scum
notes: Ran great, early access hard to say what was the game and what was Proton.
Only single player works, due to EAC. Performance with Proton is rubbish (<10FPS), while it runs good with WINE on Lutris.
